text: The flag of Marseille was adopted in meadly age with a smooth blue cross and a white back. == History == The medieval flag of the city already consisted of a white banner with a light blue cross. It had the peculiarity of being older than the coat of arms. The cross was adopted as a symbol of the Crusades, since at that time (11th - 13th centuries), in the ports of embarkation whose destination was the Holy Land, flags loaded with crosses were hoisted as a characteristic sign of the safe ports. ==Related pages== * Marseille ==References== == Other websites == Marseille Category:Marseille
